CD] OM Ananda Mananda Karaprasanam, Jnana Svarupam Nijabodha Rupam, Yogendra Midyam
Bhavarogya Vaidyam, Shrimat Gurum, Nityam Maham Bhajami OM. When we begin our meditations
in Kriya Yoga, there is a set of techniques given to us to practice which will unfold
the inner man, the inner being. And we always
01:37 - begin our sadhana, our spiritual practice,
with the OM technique. It's called the Omkar Kriya. I am now going to give you what is
called the Omkar Kriya. You must remember that as I speak, my words will penetrate your
heart and give you a healing transmission and a spiritual boost. My words will evolve
your inner emotional body, mental body and intuitional body. 
So now, the first technique, which we call
02:22 - the Omkar technique, is to do with Creation
and how we reverse the process whereby we have come. All of you have heard of the Big
Bang Theory, that at the beginning of creation, there was the Word, and the Word was with
God and God was the Word. And that Word is Omkar. So Omkar itself is chanting God within
you. So it is a sacred word and the technique is very simple. I will explain to you, step
by step. During the Omkar Technique, we take
03:04 - a sacred, little room to ourselves, a meditation
room. If we do not have the meditation room, what we do is, we take a small corner and
we face the Eastern direction of the rising sun and we sit down to meditation. Those who
cannot sit down to meditation can sit on a chair and insulate their feet with a blanket
facing the rising sun. And then sit in the aura of love. There's a good learning for
us, that whatever the situation, whatever
03:47 - the circumstances, that we must hold steadfast
to our spiritual practice. We must be constant in our sadhana. And we must be constant in
our devotion to God, whether it be through Bhajan, or Kirtan, which we call spiritual
discourse and devotional chanting.

India. And therefore we have been authorized to spread Earth Peace Through Self Peace through
the practice of Kriya Yoga. The person who
00:55 - brought about peace through peaceful means,
the independence of India, was a great man called Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi [2 October
1869 -- 30 January 1948]. This was a unique feature that there should be peace on earth
and good will to all humankind. There should be earth peace but There can be no earth peace
without self peace. The dynamic way to bring about self peace is by the practice of Kriya
Yoga. Kriya Yoga is a simple spinal breathing
01:29 - which soothes the nerves and calms the mind
at the first stage. At the second stage of Kriya Yoga which is very simple, everybody
and anybody can do it, it brings about a transformation of your body cells. It slowly starts the process
of retarding the aging process of the body cells. And the third advanced stages of the
practice of Kriya Yoga arrests the aging process of your body cells by preventing mutation
and growth. These are the phsyical benefits
02:13 - of Kriya Yoga. [Pause] The Astral benefits
are that it dilutes emotional suffering. By rythmic breathing, the emotions are calmed
and stretched out. They're diluted by the constant practice of breathing and emotional
suffering is mitigated. The third and final thing is you get mental peace, when the mind
is calm and still. Then you get to the last stage, when the mind is crystal clear. The
mind dissolves unto itself. It lies subservient
02:57 - and still without a ripple of thought. Then
the rising soul appears. Then the final stage: "Stiller than stillness itself, with bated
breath I do behold, my rising self sun's nectar gold, I dissolve in that mystery untold. This
is the beauty of Kriya Yoga. This is the splendor of Kriya Yoga. Practice Kriya Yoga. Do it
now.[Copyright  Hamsa Yoga Sangh. All rights reserved]

is tied by the self same cord of breath through love. It's high time we experience it. Enough
of reading the menu. Let's taste the food, from 7-9. It's a gourmet I tell you. [Laughter].

sessions.title: A Message From India to People All The World Over
sessions.transcript:
00:04 - Prayer. I bow to the indwelling spirit residing in
all of us. May His Grace be upon all sincere truth seekers. Today we are gathered here for the single
purpose of seeking the Supreme Reality which is the perennial source of happiness.
01:15 - The Supreme Reality has one of its essential
qualities called happiness. And in our day to day lives, in all the little
activities we have and in the rough and tumble of life, we are constantly seeking for that
one Truth called happiness. Whether we know it or not. If you're working in a job and you get a promotion,
the ultimate effect of the promotion is happiness.
01:58 - If you have a married life and you are in
harmony with your partner, the result is happiness. If you're a young sportsman, and you go in
for an Olympic gold medal or win some sports activities, the ultimate result is bliss,
joy, happiness. But all these happiness' are temporary and
evanescent. God Himself is happiness.
02:35 - Bliss, which we call SatChidAnanda, Bliss. And He is camouflaged between every success
and every fulfillment of your desire. It is the Lord, the Supreme Reality, that
is camouflaged between between every little success, every little harmony, every little
desire that is fulfilled, according to your needs.
03:04 - There is a happiness. And this happiness, is God smiling through
your success, your harmony, your fulfillment of desires. But He smiles and goes away. So now, people ask, the people who are thinking
deeply,what is that happiness by having which
03:34 - all happiness' shall be satisfied. From my happiness, to owning a ferrari, having
a ten billion dollar bank balance plus having a beautiful husband and wife, free from all
the cares and worries of this world. Now that's a tall order. No single person, place or thing can fulfill
such a demand.
04:16 - That I want to be happy under all circumstances
at all times. Even if you have a billion dollars and your
mind is a mess and you're suffering in agony, what's the use of billion dollars. Or if you have the best facility or the best
life partner but you're always in agitation about where you should keep your billion dollars,
still your mind is in agony, there's no use
04:40 - without happiness life has very little meaning
because it doesn't consummate the desire. You want a Ferrari, you get it, your desire
is consummated. It's fulfilled. So this simple word happiness, is with the
Supreme Reality. The Supreme Reality remains pure, immovable,
unchangeable, in spite of the changing scenario
05:12 - of the world. The world is a passing show, many colors,
many vicissitudes, many emotions, many successes many failures. And therefore, I have come today to give you
this message. Again I have come to give you a taste of this
perennial happiness.
05:38 - For dear souls, let me tell you that today's
satsang, today's gathering is experiential. I want you to experience the God Essence. But that too will not be with you permanent. I will give you the bliss temporarily, I will
activate the spiritual mechanism in you, the spiritual kundalini, the chakras.
06:09 - I will activate them now. And at the retreat, one month later, I shall
awaken this bliss. whereby and with the practice the simple science
of Kriya Yoga. The simple science, anybody can do it, and
everybody can do it. It's simple science of breathing with awareness.
06:31 - And by the constant application, of breathing
with awareness, you can bring peace and joy to your day to day living. It's not outer pleasures, or desires or things
which can make you happy. It's your inner state of Bliss which makes
your life a quality life. So as to improve the quality of your life
not the quantity.
07:11 - We want quality living, we want to be in harmony
with our partner, our family, our brothers and sisters, mothers and daughters. We want to live in peace and harmony and we
want to give them joy and receive joy from them also. So this is the main sub-strata of all we are
searching for.
07:35 - Some thinks its money but if money comes and
and you get it, and it starts burning your hands, you'll drop the cash. Some thinks its a beautiful partner but if
the partner is bugging you and chewing your brains day and night, then there's no use
of the beautiful partner. Beauty goes down the drain.
07:57 - There must be a happiness behind it. The ultimate result, the ultimate result,
of all human craving is total satisfaction in whatever he does. Total complete satisfaction with the person
he meets, with the place wherein he dwells and the thing or the things that he possesses.
08:22 - If there is not complete satisfaction, then
those things have no meaning. And to bring about such satisfaction, the
yogis have asked themselves the question, for thousands of years, India has been a beacon
of light and love to the world, spreading very slowly. Because it is not a pathway of conversion
or forcing others, it is a pathway which comes
08:56 - like the morning dew very silent but it's
presented before you every morning. You have to have the eyes to see, the heart
to feel and the ears to hear the silent dewdrops falling on the leaves. The silent condensation taking place. And so here it is before you the message,
silently and humbly.
09:20 - When you practice this, after the question
was asked what is that happiness by having which all happiness would be satisfied? What is that wisdom by having which all wisdom
may be satisfied? What is that desire by having which, by fulfilling
which, all other desires may be fulfilled. Now here dear souls, here is what's in it
for you.
09:50 - This is the crme dela crme of what I'm
saying. What is that desire, which after having fulfilled,
all other desires will be fulfilled. And the answer comes in the innermost firmament
of your consciousness...That God is that desire which after having fulfilled and realized
all other desires are fulfilled. And therefore in order to achieve the God
Essence which lies at the core of your being,
10:30 - there is a simple practice of Kriya Yoga. A simple pathway to bliss and happiness, of
breathing with awareness. It's simple, anyone can do it, and everybody,
all of you can do it. And it's the most effective and swiftest pathway
it is the lightning path to God. This is the message from India which we offer
to people all the world over.
11:10 - Practice it and see for yourself.

sessions.title: Birthday Celebration May 10
sessions.transcript:
The purpose of mans sojourn on this earth, the most important purpose of his sojourn on this earth is to seek God.

Today is the birthday of your guru, he teaches you that as you grow older your inner spark should become brighter. And every birthday your consciousness must expand, the next birthday more. So, the expansion of your divine consciousness, visa vi your aging process is a very essential factor of a balanced life so whatever vocation you have, whatever you do in life dont forget to do your kriya yog. This is the message of the master. And if you do your kriya yog I will tell you, kriya yog is for God, its for Atma Pratiti its for spiritual realization and evolution. All that is ok, but let me tell you a material fact, from the grossest advantage of yog. The human body is carbon based, am I right? The human body is carbon based, so is the earth carbon based. Now the purpose of mans life from the lowest the material end, from the spiritual end the only purpose of mans life, the most important purpose is to seek god. But from the physical material point of view which you can grasp, the human body is carbon based, and therefore as you grow older the most important purpose of yours is to find a method whereby you can decarbonize your body and make it alkaline. Carbon and acidity in your body brings disease decay and death. So, the most powerful way of decarbonizing your body is the practice of kriya yog. Is a rejuve and detox method, it rejuvenates and detoxes you. As your breath comes up, you evolve consciousness, and all the cells in your body are oxygenated and start vibrating with new life. Old cells are repaired, degenerated cells are regenerated. So, its like a sanjeevani, its a rejuvenation.

Burns your past evil karmas, and detoxifies the body, it decarbonizes the body, so you have to decarb your body. See carbon is black is like this, you understand? So, human beings live in ignorance, they cannot see the inner light because of the carbon then the guru shows the light. So, you have to see, that through the lamp glass of your body you can see the light of your soul. Can you see it all? Can you see your body is the lamp glass? Your body is the lamp and the flame is your soul. Thats what you should be, thats what you are undying. Your body only dies, the flame is immortal. So, you look to the guru, to show you the light that he is, shown himself he will show you also. This is the work of the master. 

Now we will sit in silence.

So, we chant something on my birthday in honor of our ancestors. So, in India we have our lineages back right up to the gods. All of you are divine beings and youre connected with your gotras, who are the divine rishis, which is very, very important. 

All Chanting: Shri Ram Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram  
All chanting: Om Namah Shivay

sessions.title: Share My Samadhi of Soul Consciousness
sessions.transcript:
00:08 - [Filmed in Los Angeles, California on 08.10.2010
- Learn Kriya Yoga from a Living Master: Yogiraj Siddhanath] [Opening Music Introduction] This
is an open eye experiment, an open eye. Do not close your eyes, keep your eyes open.
If your eyes burn, with the wave of the hand and rose water, I shall take away the burning
of your eyes but keep looking at me for I am going to give you the experience to be
very simple about it, I am not going to chew
00:46 - words, I am going to give you my soul consciousness
of a thoughtless awareness, my enlightened consciousness of a thoughtless awareness.
Aye? [Response] Aye. This will be done by you first becoming like a child of five. You
know how you were when you were five? Transport yourself back to that carefree age. Then drop
all inhibition and resistance. Drop all armor and make yourself available to me. Form a
golden gate bridge between your heart and
01:22 - my heart. Open your eyes and don't close them.
Form a golden gate bridge between your heart and my heart, open your eyes. With this technique,
we will realize that at the level of consciousness, humanity is one. That is one thing. Secondly,
we will realize, during this process, your aging... you get an anti-aging effect. The
decaying process stops in that moment of time. This is the ultimate spa because if your mind
doesn't work, if your thoughts don't work
01:51 - and molecules are not there, there's no disease,
decay and death. If nothing moves there is no change. Only movement has change but nothing
can have no change. Because change is only of something, change cannot be of nothing.
Nothing cannot change. Only something can change. Aye? [Response] Aye. Different language
but it's true. So I am giving you nothing but it is the source of everything - it is
soul consciousness. So you get to taste my
02:20 - soul consciousness. When I give you soul consciousness,
receive it with love and reverence. Look at me form the golden gate bridge, drop the mind
open the heart, be in attunement. As I wave my hand, you'll go into the silence. Look
at me and nowhere else. Be in silence. When I wave my hand, thoughts will disappear and
you will enter a profound peace and bliss according to your harmony with me. Ready?
[Gurunath starts Shivapat] Thoughts are still.
03:07 - The mind's lake is crystal. [Shivapat] Keep
looking at me. The aura you will see, the changing faces, but be still with me. Tune
into my consciousness and your mind will disappear. [The Master's Shivapat continues] If your
eyes are burning, keep them open. I will remove the burning sensation. Now keep your eyes
open. Be with me. Focus on soul consciousness. Removing the burning sensation of the eyes
[Gurunath waves his hand across] Okay. Burning
05:14 - sensation gone, Aye? [Response] Aye. Keep
looking. When you see the aura of light, you can see the concentric circles of colors violet,
indigo, blue, green, orange, red each according to the degree of clairvoyance. The rainbow
body, as they say, around the master. Cottony white gold, violet, indigo, blue, green two
colors, five colors, depending on what you see you will see. That's your clairaudience
for today. The faces will be past life associations.
05:60 - [Shivapat] The spirit of God has infused this
house. The more you relax, the more you will see. Keep calmly looking. Be in the still
mind. The decay and the aging of the body cells has been arrested. The more you relax
the stiller you will be in my soul consciousness. Come share my samadhi. You are sharing my
samadhi. [Copyright Hamsa Yoga Sangh. All rights reserved]

sessions.title: Video Rental: Share My Samadhi of Soul Consciousness (Extended Play)
sessions.transcript:
This is an extended play version of the YouTube video posted Feb 24, 2011.

Support Master Yogiraj Siddhanath's Worldwide Mission. Buy and download this exact same video for inspiration to play on your computer or mobile device: http://store.payloadz.com/go?id=935951

HYS Vintage Video Series - Filmed in Los Angeles, California on 08.10.2010 - Learn Kriya Yoga from a Living Master: Yogiraj SatGurunath Siddhanath http://www.hamsa-yoga.org/kriya-yoga 

This is an open eye experiment, an open eye. Do not close your eyes, keep your eyes open. If your eyes burn, with the wave of the hand and rose water, I shall take away the burning of your eyes but keep looking at me for I am going to give you the experience to be very simple about it, I am not going to chew words, I am going to give you my soul consciousness of a thoughtless awareness, my enlightened consciousness of a thoughtless awareness. Aye? [Response] Aye. This will be done by you first by becoming like a child of five. You know how you were when you were five? Transport yourself back to that carefree age. Then drop all inhibition and resistance. Drop all armor and make yourself available to me. Form a gold gate bridge between your heart and my heart. Open your eyes and don't close them. Form a golden gate bridge between your heart and my heart, open your eyes. With this technique, we will realize that at the level of consciousness, humanity is one. That is one thing. Secondly, we will realize, during this process, your aging... you get an anti-aging effect. The decaying process stops in that moment of time. This is the ultimate spa because if your mind doesn't work, if your thoughts don't work and molecules are not there, there's no disease, decay and death. If nothing moves there is no change. Only movement has change but nothing can have no change. Because change is only of something, change cannot be of nothing. Nothing cannot change. Only something can change. Aye? [Response] Aye. Different language but it's true. So I am giving you nothing but it is the source of everything - it is soul consciousness. So you get to taste my soul consciousness. When I give you soul consciousness, receive it with love and reverence. Look at me form the golden gate bridge, drop the mind open the heart, be in attunement. As I wave my hand, you'll go into the silence. Look at me and nowhere else. Be in silence. When I wave my hand, thoughts will disappear and you will enter a profound peace and bliss according to your harmony with me. Ready? [Gurunath starts Shivapat] thoughts are still. The mind's lake is crystal. [Shivapat Gaze] Keep looking at me. The aura you will see. The changing faces, but be still with me. Tune into my consciousness and your mind will disappear. [The Master's Shivapat gaze continues] If your eyes are burning, keep them open, I will remove the burning sensation. Now keep your eyes open. Be with me. Focus on soul consciousness. Removing the burning sensation of the eyes [Gurunath waves his hand across] Okay, burning sensation gone, Aye? [Response] Aye. Keep looking. When you see the aura of light, you can see the concentric circles of colors violet, indigo, blue, green, orange, red each according to the degree of clairvoyance. The rainbow body, as they say, around the master. Cottony white gold, violet, indigo, blue, green two colors, five colors, depending on what you see you will see. That's your clairaudience for today. The faces will be past life associations. [Shivapat Gaze] The spirit of God has infused this house. The more you relax, the more you will see. Keep calmly looking. Be in the still mind. The decay and the aging of the body cells has been arrested. The more you relax the stiller you will be in my soul consciousness. Come share my samadhi. You are sharing my samadhi.

sessions.title: Does Existence Need Existence to Prove Itself?
sessions.transcript:
00:05 - [Filmed Northwest Retreat Portland, Oregon
September 2010] [Signup for a 2011 retreat with Yogiraj Siddhanath] Just lead the good
life, breathe God. Breathe Him in and breathe Him out and saturate yourself with God so
much that there is no room for anybody but God. Never mind what other people say, never
mind what philosophers talk about, unless you fall in love with your breath and get
mad after God, there is little that can be
01:04 - achieved. And all the other achievements come
to naught. When Alexander (the Great) conquered large portions of the world, his Guru who
was from India, his Master, came to Alexander and told him, that the Guru's was Kalinath,
mispronounced Kalyanos, Kalinath of the Nath tradition, to which I belong. He told him,
Alexander what have you lost and what have you gained? Nothing was yours so that you
could have gained it. The only things that
01:39 - you must have control of is life and death,
that is in the hands of God. So when you die you come with nothing and you go with nothing.
You have to teach this lesson to the world. So when you die and they bury you, tell them
to keep your hands out of the grave empty. Empty I came and empty I did depart, except
for the spirit that I am taking with me. So he (Alexander) took a great spirit with him.
He was not only a great conqueror and a warrior,
02:10 - but he was a great yogi and a great spiritual
soul. And you will hear the sound of Alexander, and his preachings and teachings through various
climes and times and people and climates. And so was the great emperor, Genghis Khan,
the king of kings, the emperor of emperors, these mighty beings. That when they focused
on the sun, or whoever they thought of to be God, they had the capacity to lose themselves,
so intense was their concentration. That Khan,
02:49 - was the sun incarnate himself. 
Such are the stories of these great people, that they not only conquered the world but
they had conquered a lot within themselves too so as to be able to be absorbed in God,
so as to be able to be absorbed in the Supreme Being. And all of you have this potential
of Alexander and the emperor of emperors, Genghis Khan. And all these great warriors
and all these great saints like Jesus, like
03:31 - Buddha, the Christ, Apollonius of Tyana, all
these great people, Francis of Assisi, Anandamayi Ma. She was the avatar of the century and
she showed us this spirituality is not the monopoly of men, that women can avail of this
state even as much as men can. Their pathways may be different because they choose to be
different. They choose the way of the heart. If they choose the way of the spiritual power
of the soul, then they shall go that way,
04:10 - if they choose the way of devotion, they shall
go that way. So unto all of us He is here, He is speaking to me, He is speaking to you
this moment. And it is the one who is hearing him that is God also. The one who is speaking
is God, the one who is hearing is God also. So we must be drunk with Him. Inhale God,
exhale God, live God, love God, eat God, live God, die God, resurrect God and be constantly
with God for He is so essential to our being
04:51 - and existence. The other day, an article came
from Stephen Hawking saying that existence does not need God for its proof, naturally
not, because God is just a word. Call it what you may. Existence is existence, God is existence
so why should existence need existence to prove itself? But existence, God, is not dependent
on existence, like the ocean is not dependent on the wave. Existence comes into being through
the white hole and the big bang and disappears
05:42 - through the supermassive black hole. But in
all its 311 Trillion years of the creation, preservation and destruction of the universe,
God is there. And after the universe disappears, God is still there. After the universe appears,
He is still there. He needs no credit for what He is doing for there is nothing else
but Him. There is nothing else but God. You are God, I am God, He is God, this is God,
that is God, everything is Him. There is nothing
06:16 - that is not Him. [Copyright  Hamsa Yoga
